USER_VERIFIED_SUCCESS: Your Account has been verified successfully.
SESSION_EXPIRED: Session is expired. Login again to continue.
PROFILE_UPDATE_ERROR: Something Went Wrong While Updating Profile! Please Try Again Later!
OTP_EXPIRED: Your Otp has been expired, Please resend code!
USER_BLOCKED: User Has been blocked, contact your administrator.
USERNAME_EXIST: User name already exists! please try different one.
PASSWORD_INVALID: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SUCCESS: We have sent a reset password link to your email.
PASSWORD_RESET_SUCCESS: Password updated successfully. Please try logging in again.
USER_ALREADY_EXIST: User already register with us. Please try logging in again.
